messages.text:
LGTM.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5529049/diff/4001/graphics/blur_test.go
File graphics/blur_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5529049/diff/4001/graphics/blur_test.go#newcode8
graphics/blur_test.go:8: "graphics-go.googlecode.com/hg/graphics/graphicstest"
As a follow-up CL, I think that gofix will update this from
"graphics-go.googlecode.com/hg/graphics/graphicstest" to
"code.google.com/p/graphics-go/graphics/graphicstest".

You will need to update the Makefiles manually.

*** Submitted as 80052f2fdc75 ***

graphics: split out graphicstest package

R=nigeltao
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5529049

Hello nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://crawshaw%40google.com@code.google.com/p/graphics-go/
